jobs.title: Store Manager (Hamburg) - (m/f/d)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
We're on a mission to make the speciality coffee experience more affordable, digital, and convenient. In a world where services continue to move into the virtual world, LAP (Life Among People) is bringing back the human touch paired with the personalisation and convenience that modern consumers have gotten used to with digital business.

We're a small but mighty team serving coffees out of our stores in Berlin and quickly expanding to the rest of Germany. We're looking for a Store Manager in Hamburg to work directly with our leadership Team.

As a Store Manager at LAP Coffee, you will be instrumental in the success of our brand in the city of Hamburg, where we aim to to become the largest . If you are looking to join at an exciting time and have tons of ownership, impact and visibility, this is the place for you.

What you will do:

You'll be responsible for the first store in Hamburg. You’ll oversee store operations, including staffing, sales, P&L, and customer satisfaction. When necessary, you will go behind the counter and motivate the team to deliver exceptional service while driving business growth and profitability.

  • Team Leadership: Ensure baristas are working towards achieving company goals while upholding cultural standards.

  • Operational Excellence: Maintain elite operating standards across all locations under your management.

  • Community Engagement: Build meaningful relationships with neighborhood businesses and residents to foster local brand loyalty and goodwill.

  • Team Scheduling: Oversee and manage team schedules to ensure punctuality and operational readiness.

  • Training Adherence: Master and apply product, service, and brand training playbooks to maintain consistency and quality.

  • Product Quality Management: Ensure proper measures are in place to handle products correctly, preserving their freshness and quality in both food and beverage offerings.

  • Waste Reduction: Implement and sustain systems to minimize product wastage by monitoring and adjusting par levels in line with business fluctuations.

  • Health & Safety Compliance: Maintain health and safety standards at all times, ensuring a clean and safe working environment.

What you bring:

  • 2–4 years of leadership experience in hospitality or retail F&B, with a strong track record in team scaling, inventory, and supply chain management. Coffee industry experience is a plus.

  • Entrepreneurial, solution-focused, and adaptable to fast-paced, start-up environments.

  • Strong communication, organizational, and problem-solving skills under pressure.

  • Proven ability to spot growth opportunities, test ideas, and execute within tight budgets.

  • Willing to travel occasionally for new opportunities.

  • Fluent in English and German.

  • Performance Tracking: Accurately track and report daily KPIs, inventory counts, and commissary supply transfers for locations under your management.

  • Customer Growth Strategies: Collaborate with Brand and Marketing team to create and execute strategies for growing a loyal customer base.

  • Financial Management: Take ownership of the P&L for each store under your management, identify areas for improvement, and develop innovative solutions to enhance performance.

  • Team Development: Support and cultivate a cohesive team of baristas, inspiring them to grow into future General Managers.

What we offer:

  • Ambitious team: Work closely with our experienced leadership to build and scale an innovative lifestyle consumer coffee brand

  • Fun and passion: Become part of our curious and diverse team cherishing our joint love for good food, regular team events, and coffee culture.

  • Exciting industry: Be at the forefront to revolutionize the coffee industry and make speciality coffee affordable and accessible Backing of leading investors: Join a promising startup early on while relying on the backing of top investors.

To ensure that we provide an inclusive and accessible interview process, please let us know if you require any accommodations or adjustments during the interview due to a disability. Your response will help us support you effectively. (For example, adjustments might include accessibility needs, assistive technology, or extra time for certain tasks) 💙

jobs.title: Barista Host at LAP Coffee (Munich) - (m/f/d)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About Lap
We are looking for a Barista Host to join our team part-time.

LAP is a grab-and-go coffee chain operation in micro size hubs - offering products at a price point customers can afford every day, multiple times a day. In short, we are on a mission to make the specialty coffee experience more accessible, digital, and convenient.

In a world where services continue to move more towards digitalization, LAP (Life Among People) is bringing back the human touch paired with the personalisation and convenience that modern consumers have gotten used to.

Centered around emotion - the smell of a morning coffee, the warmth of a coffee cup, the social interaction and conversations shared over a coffee, the smile of the barista - we’re making high-quality coffee radically more accessible.

We're a small and friendly team of hosts, not just baristas. We're looking for a LAP host to join our team. As a LAP host, you are the face of LAP and promote our values by creating a friendly and approachable atmosphere - a place where people feel appreciated, understood in all that we do, and are able to enjoy a damn good cup of coffee.


Your role

  • Customer service: Act as a generous host. Provide excellent customer service to our guests, be knowledgeable on all of our products, upsell food and drinks to fit the cravings of our customers.

  • Coffee making: Produce all coffee based beverages, teas and drinks according to our Service Standards with special attention towards detail and care.

  • Front of House: Operate the POS system, maintain cleanliness and organization of the shop, perform all opening and closing duties.

What you need to succeed:

  • A strong customer service mentality.

  • Good organization and the ability to multitask.

  • Available to work on weekends.

  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. You are energized by working with people.

  • Ability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic and busy environment.

  • You are reliable, committed and take initiative.

  • Full fluency in English is mandatory. German is a strong plus.

  • Speciality coffee experience is a big plus.

Benefits:

  • Free coffees and drinks

  • Flexible hours

Why join LAP ☕️ ?

  • Fun and passion: Become part of our curious and diverse team cherishing our joint love for good food, regular team events, and coffee culture.

  • Exciting industry: Be at the forefront of revolutionizing the coffee industry by making specialty coffee affordable, accessible and top of mind.

  • Opportunities to grow in the company: Join a promising startup early and grow with us.

To ensure that we provide an inclusive and accessible interview process, please let us know if you require any accommodations or adjustments during the interview due to a disability. Your response will help us support you effectively. (For example, adjustments might include accessibility needs, assistive technology, or extra time for certain tasks) 💙

jobs.title: Store Manager (Munich) - (m/f/d)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Werde Teil von LAP Coffee als Store Manager:in in München ☕💙
Unsere Mission: Specialty-Coffee bezahlbar, digital und bequem machen – ohne dabei den menschlichen Touch zu verlieren. In einer Welt, in der immer mehr Services ins Digitale wandern, bringt LAP (Life Among People) das Persönliche zurück: mit echtem Kundenkontakt, aber auch der Bequemlichkeit und Individualität, die moderne Konsument:innen von digitalen Geschäftsmodellen gewohnt sind.

Wir sind ein kleines, ambitioniertes Team mit Wurzeln in Berlin – und großen Plänen für ganz Deutschland. Jetzt suchen wir eine:n Store Manager:in für München, der oder die mit uns die Kaffeerevolution in die nächste Stadt bringt. In dieser Rolle arbeitest du eng mit unserem Leadership-Team zusammen und prägst den Aufbau und Erfolg unserer Standorte in München maßgeblich mit.


Deine Rolle bei LAP Coffee:

Als Store Manager:in wirst du eine zentrale Rolle für unseren Erfolg in München spielen – einer Stadt, in der wir viel vorhaben. Wenn du Lust hast, in einer spannenden Wachstumsphase mit viel Eigenverantwortung, Gestaltungsspielraum und direktem Impact dabei zu sein, dann bist du bei uns genau richtig.

Das erwartet dich bei uns:

  • Standortverantwortung: Du führst die ersten LAP-Stores in München, sorgst für reibungslose Abläufe, betreust Sales, P&L und die Kundenzufriedenheit. Wenn nötig, springst du selbst mit hinter die Theke und motivierst dein Team, Höchstleistungen zu bringen.

  • Teamführung: Du führst, förderst und entwickelst dein Team, setzt klare Ziele und lebst unsere Unternehmenskultur vor.

  • Operational Excellence: Du stellst sicher, dass alle Standorte unter deiner Verantwortung auf Top-Niveau laufen – effizient, sauber, strukturiert.

  • Brücken bauen und Community stärken: Du baust Beziehungen in der Nachbarschaft auf – zu Stammkund:innen, lokalen Unternehmen und Partner:innen – und stärkst so die Marke vor Ort.

  • Personalplanung: Du kümmerst dich um effiziente Dienstpläne und sorgst für eine reibungslose Besetzung der Schichten.

  • Training & Standards: Du verinnerlichst unsere Playbooks zu Produkten, Service und Marke – und gibst sie an dein Team weiter.

  • Produktqualität & Frische: Du stellst sicher, dass unsere Getränke und Speisen stets frisch und in höchster Qualität serviert werden.

  • Waste Management: Du entwickelst clevere Lösungen, um Überproduktion und Abfall zu vermeiden – mit Blick auf Nachfrage und Wirtschaftlichkeit.

  • Hygiene & Sicherheit: Du sorgst für eine sichere, saubere und gesunde Arbeitsumgebung – immer.


Das bringst du mit:

  • 2–4 Jahre Führungserfahrung in Gastronomie, Einzelhandel oder Food & Beverage zum Beispiel Systemgastronomie, Ausbildung/Studium im Hotel- und Restaurantfach (Quereinsteiger:innen mit Erfahrung willkommen)

  • Erfahrung in Teamführung, Warenwirtschaft & operativem Geschäft

  • Idealerweise: Hintergrund im Kaffee- oder Spezialitätenbereich

  • Unternehmerisches Mindset, lösungsorientiert, hands-on

  • Organisationsstärke, Kommunikationsgeschick & Ruhe in stressigen Situationen

  • Fähigkeit, Wachstumspotenziale zu erkennen und umzusetzen – auch mit begrenztem Budget

  • Bereitschaft, gelegentlich zu reisen

  • Fließend in Deutsch und Englisch

Deine Wirkung:

  • Kennzahlen im Griff: Du trackst KPIs, Lagerbestände und Lieferungen und hast die Zahlen deiner Standorte stets im Blick.

  • Kundenbindung stärken: Du arbeitest mit dem Marketing-Team an Ideen und Aktionen zur Kundengewinnung und -bindung.

  • Finanzielle Verantwortung: Du hast die P&L deiner Standorte im Griff und entwickelst Ansätze zur Performance-Optimierung.

  • Teamförderung: Du begleitest Baristas auf ihrem Weg zur Weiterentwicklung – bis hin zur Store-Leitung.

Was wir dir bieten:

  • Ein ambitioniertes Team: Arbeite eng mit unserer erfahrenen Leadership zusammen und baue mit uns eine innovative Lifestyle-Kaffeemarke auf

  • Leidenschaft & Spaß: Werde Teil eines neugierigen, diversen Teams mit gemeinsamer Liebe zu gutem Kaffee, Essen und Team-Events

  • Branche mit Zukunft: Gestalte aktiv die Zukunft der Spezialitätenkaffee-Szene mit

  • Starke Investoren im Rücken: Sei früh bei einem vielversprechenden Start-up dabei, das auf solides Wachstum setzt


Transparente & faire Bewerbung:
Wenn du Unterstützung oder Anpassungen im Bewerbungsprozess brauchst (z. B. barrierefreier Zugang, technische Hilfsmittel oder mehr Zeit für Aufgaben), sag uns gerne Bescheid – wir möchten dich bestmöglich unterstützen 💙

jobs.title: Student Brand Manager (m/f/d) - Munich
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Become a Student Brand Manager (m/f/d) for LAP Coffee in Munich 💙☕️
️
We’re growing fast and looking for students who get what LAP is about: bold ideas, good taste, and making noise in all the right places. This program is only for LMU students.

As a Student Brand Manager, you'll pitch bold ideas, run creative stunts and shape how students experience the brand, with perks and behind-the-scenes insights along the way.

If it’s a match, this could even be your first step into a long-term role at LAP.

Just fill out the form. If we vibe, we’ll invite you to a short interview.

How You’ll Make It Happen?
Big Ideas: Launch bold activations on campus
Hacks & Drops: Run guerrilla-style campaigns
Club Links: Collaborate with student groups
Trend Watch: Share what’s hot on campus
Be the Face: Rep LAP at key events & create viral content

What You Get Out of It?
Family & Friends: Free drinks for you + 20 vouchers for your crew
Campus Fits: LAP hoodies, tees & caps
Creative Control: Pitch bold ideas & lead them your way
Spotlight Moments: Get featured on LAP’s socials
VIP Access: Early invites to events & launches
Real Growth: Chance to join LAP during or after your studies

Application deadline: October 15, 2025

To ensure that we provide an inclusive and accessible interview process, please let us know if you require any accommodations or adjustments during the interview due to a disability. Your response will help us support you effectively. (For example, adjustments might include accessibility needs, assistive technology, or extra time for certain tasks) 💙

jobs.title: Growth Lead (f/m/x)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Our mission: LAP is a grab-and-go coffee chain operating in micro size hubs, offering products at a price point customers can afford every day, multiple times a day. In short, we are on a mission to make the specialty coffee experience more accessible, digital, and convenient.

In a world where services continue to move more towards digitalization, LAP (Life Among People) is bringing back the human touch paired with the personalisation and convenience that modern consumers have gotten used to.

Centered around emotion, the smell of a morning coffee, the warmth of a coffee cup, the social interaction and conversations shared over a coffee, the smile of the barista - we’re making high-quality coffee radically more accessible.

You’ll support our mission to grow, continuously evolve and expand our services as a Growth Lead (f/m/x)

The Opportunity:

We are seeking a highly strategic, entrepreneurial and data-driven person to be the engine behind our rapid expansion. This is a crucial leadership role responsible for the overall strategy and execution of all initiatives designed to drive awareness, foot traffic, customer acquisition, and loyalty, with a primary focus on maximising the success of new and existing coffee shop locations.

Reporting directly to the CEO, you will co-lead a team encompassing of Marketing, Customer Acquisition, Activations and Community Management. Your success will be measured by your ability to implement scalable growth systems and deliver measurable results in a high-speed, hyper-growth environment.

What You'll Do:

Growth Strategy & Leadership

  • Develop and execute a comprehensive, data-driven growth strategy that directly supports expansion of our footprint as well as the ongoing success of our existing locations.

  • Mentor, and inspire a diverse team (Brand & Marketing, Community Management, Data & Tech), fostering a culture of creativity, rapid experimentation, performance, and accountability.

  • Work closely with the Social Media Team and the Activations Team do deliver integrated campaigns and strategies

  • Own the Growth P&L and budget allocation, ensuring maximum Return on Investment (ROI) across all digital and local initiatives (e.g., maximising spend on grand opening events vs. targeted organic growth).

  • Utilise full marketing toolbox (e.g., CRM, marketing automation, analytics platforms) to drive efficiency and effectiveness across all growth initiatives.

Local Marketing & Customer Acquisition

  • Direct all Brand and Marketing efforts (digital, local print, in-store signage, app/loyalty programs) to build neighbourhood brand equity, drive consistent foot traffic, and increase Customer Lifetime Value (CLV).

  • Spearhead the "0 to 1" marketing launch playbook for new stores, ensuring seamless, high-impact Grand Openings that generate immediate buzz and sustainable business.

  • Leverage geo-fencing, local partnerships, and targeted digital campaigns to capture the attention of the local trade area around each store.

  • Develop and optimize customer acquisition and activation funnels to drive initial visits and repeat purchases.

Data Excellence & Hyperscaling

  • Instill a culture of data-driven decision-making by defining key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure and adjust the impact of your work.

  • Deeply analyze location-specific performance data, customer feedback, and competitive activity to inform strategic pivots and ensure sustained, healthy growth during periods of hyper-scaling.

Community & Experience

  • Define the strategy for Community Management and Event Management to truly embed each coffee shop into its neighbourhood.

  • Oversee the scheduling and promotion of local events that drive off-peak traffic and foster loyalty.

  • Work closely with the Operations team to ensure the in-store design and customer experience align seamlessly with the brand's marketing promise.

What You'll Bring:

  • 5+ years of progressive leadership experience in growth, marketing, or a related function, with at least 3 years in a senior leadership role.

  • Essential experience leading growth for a rapidly expanding brick & mortar/retail/F&B business (coffee, QSR, food service, hospitality, etc.). You understand site selection context, trade area marketing, and store-level economics.

  • Proven track record in a hyper-scaling environment, demonstrating the ability to build scalable processes and high-performing teams under pressure and rapid change.

  • Exceptional proficiency in data-driven decision-making and performance marketing. You must be comfortable with attribution, funnel optimization, A/B testing, and growth loops that directly impact physical store performance.

  • Deep expertise across the entire growth stack, including localized digital marketing, CRM/loyalty programs, and local partnership development.

  • Strong cross-functional leadership skills, with the ability to influence partners (Real Estate, Operations, Finance) at all levels.

Please note: We are an onsite-first company, which means we value in-person collaboration, hands-on teamwork and the energy that comes from building our stores and brand together on the ground. To ensure that we provide an inclusive and accessible interview process, please let us know if you require any accommodations or adjustments during the interview due to a disability. Your response will help us support you effectively. (For example, adjustments might include accessibility needs, assistive technology, or extra time for certain tasks) ️ ☕️💙

jobs.title: Barista Host at LAP Coffee (Hamburg)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About Lap
We are looking for a Barista Host to join our team part-time in Hamburg.

LAP is a grab-and-go coffee chain operation in micro size hubs - offering products at a price point customers can afford every day, multiple times a day. In short, we are on a mission to make the specialty coffee experience more accessible, digital, and convenient.

In a world where services continue to move more towards digitalization, LAP (Life Among People) is bringing back the human touch paired with the personalisation and convenience that modern consumers have gotten used to.

Centered around emotion - the smell of a morning coffee, the warmth of a coffee cup, the social interaction and conversations shared over a coffee, the smile of the barista - we’re making high-quality coffee radically more accessible.

We're a small and friendly team of hosts, not just baristas. We're looking for a LAP host to join our team. As a LAP host, you are the face of LAP and promote our values by creating a friendly and approachable atmosphere - a place where people feel appreciated, understood in all that we do, and are able to enjoy a damn good cup of coffee.


Your role

  • Customer service: Act as a generous host. Provide excellent customer service to our guests, be knowledgeable on all of our products, upsell food and drinks to fit the cravings of our customers.

  • Coffee making: Produce all coffee based beverages, teas and drinks according to our Service Standards with special attention towards detail and care.

  • Front of House: Operate the POS system, maintain cleanliness and organization of the shop, perform all opening and closing duties.

What you need to succeed:

  • A strong customer service mentality.

  • Good organization and the ability to multitask.

  • Available to work on weekends.

  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. You are energized by working with people.

  • Ability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic and busy environment.

  • You are reliable, committed and take initiative.

  • Full fluency in English is mandatory. German is a strong plus.

  • Speciality coffee experience is a big plus.

Benefits:

  • Free coffees and drinks

  • Flexible hours

Why join LAP? ☕️

  • Fun and passion: Become part of our curious and diverse team cherishing our joint love for good food, regular team events, and coffee culture.

  • Exciting industry: Be at the forefront of revolutionizing the coffee industry by making specialty coffee affordable, accessible and top of mind.

  • Opportunities to grow in the company: Join a promising startup early and grow with us.

Your response will help us support you effectively. (For example, adjustments might include accessibility needs, assistive technology, or extra time for certain tasks) 💙

jobs.title: Training Lead – Coffee/F&B (m/f/d)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Training Lead – Coffee/F&B (m/f/d)

Our mission: LAP is a grab-and-go coffee chain operation in micro size hubs - offering products at a price point customers can afford every day, multiple times a day. In short, we are on a mission to make the specialty coffee experience more accessible, digital, and convenient.

In a world where services continue to move more towards digitalization, LAP (Life Among People) is bringing back the human touch paired with the personalisation and convenience that modern consumers have gotten used to.

Centered around emotion - the smell of a morning coffee, the warmth of a coffee cup, the social interaction and conversations shared over a coffee, the smile of the barista - we’re making high-quality coffee radically more accessible.

You’ll support our mission to grow, continuously evolve and expand our services as a Training Lead – Coffee/F&B (m/f/d)

People Leadership & Team Development:

  • Lead, inspire, and manage a team of trainers across our operating regions.

  • Provide coaching, mentoring, and professional growth opportunities (Train-the-Trainer programs).

  • Foster a learning culture built on feedback, empowerment, and career progression.

  • Keep your trainers in the loop with any changes and new developments, and make sure they are implementing these in the stores on a regular basis.

Learning & Development (L&D):

  • Design and implement a holistic learning framework (onboarding, upskilling, leadership development).

  • Develop structured career paths and continuous learning opportunities for F&B employees and our training team.

  • Drive adoption of modern learning methods (blended learning, digital learning, microlearning).

Coffee & F&B Expertise:

  • Ensure training content is high-quality, brand-consistent, and relevant to coffee and wider F&B operations.

  • Combine technical knowledge (coffee, barista, F&B operations) with service, leadership, and customer experience training.

  • Monitor industry trends and integrate them into training strategy.

Strategic Responsibility:

  • Define and execute a long-term training strategy for F&B.

  • Partner with HR, Operations, and Business Units to identify capability needs.

  • Track training effectiveness through KPIs and report on impact of L&D programs.

Required Qualifications:

  • 3-5 years of experience in People Management (leading and training teams, developing talent). Preferably in the hospitality/retail F&B, or coffee industry

  • Solid background in F&B Training, ideally with coffee expertise.

  • Strong track record in Learning & Development: building frameworks, implementing programs, and measuring impact.

  • Experience in change management and building a strong learning culture.

  • Excellent command of English (additional languages a plus).

Nice-to-have:

  • -> Certifications in L&D and Training and/or Coffee/F&B industry, e.g. SCA

  • -> Experience with digital learning tools (LMS, mobile learning apps)

Your attributes:

  • Inspiring leader with high emotional intelligence and coaching mindset.

  • Excellent communication, facilitation, and presentation skills.

  • Strategic, structured, and business-oriented thinker.

  • Passion for coffee and hospitality combined with professional L&D expertise.

  • Strong intercultural competence and international exposure.

Why join LAP Coffee?

  • Collaboration: Work hand-in-hand with the Founders Team to translate the company’s vision and culture into learning strategies.

  • Fun and passion: Become part of our curious and diverse team cherishing our joint love for good food, regular team events, and coffee culture.

  • Exciting industry: Be at the forefront of revolutionizing the coffee industry by making specialty coffee affordable, accessible and top of mind.

  • Opportunities to grow in the company: Join a promising startup early and grow with us.

  • Our Benefits: Enjoy a range of benefits that not only enhances your work, but also your personal life.

To ensure that we provide an inclusive and accessible interview process, please let us know if you require any accommodations or adjustments during the interview due to a disability. Your response will help us support you effectively. (For example, adjustments might include accessibility needs, assistive technology, or extra time for certain tasks) 💙
